demos.title: HEADSUP
demos.summary:
To login to the demo, username=me@demo.lk and password=demo.lk
The demo will allow you to add/edit a payee, add the payee to a group. Thereafter, you can use your Androin POS app to send in a transaction, then view the transaction in the History.

demos.title: POS-on-da-SPOT
